function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor crowding effects potentially contributing to increased influenza incidence","Impact":"Increased risk of influenza transmission and higher incidence rates","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce indoor crowding, improve ventilation, and promote good hygiene practices","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Indoor occupants, especially in crowded spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertain relationship between indoor and outdoor environmental parameters in tropical regions","Impact":"Difficulties in predicting and controlling indoor humidity levels, potentially impacting disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the relationship, promote proper air conditioning techniques, and improve ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air conditioning systems, humidity sensors, and climate control devices","People":"Occupants in tropical regions, especially in buildings with varying income levels","Owner":"Building owners, environmental researchers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Differences in indoor temperature and humidity levels based on income and wealth in tropical regions","Impact":"Potential disparities in indoor environmental conditions affecting disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promote equitable access to air conditioning, improve building infrastructure, and raise awareness about indoor environmental health","Technologies":"Energy-efficient air conditioning, building insulation, and community outreach programs","People":"Communities with varying income levels in tropical regions","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, and public health authorities"}]}
